featured.text: What is the significance of the third eye in Hindu tradition? (A) To stay in harmony with nature.
However, in response to the 29 of this event, the concepts of fostering peace and harmony do not have to be confined to one day a year.

definition.zh_def: 和諧；一致，特別是在音樂或人際關係中。
definition.en_def: A pleasing arrangement of parts; a state of agreement or concord.
definition.example: The choir sang in perfect harmony.
